snippet: Matthew G. Olsen has been director of the National Counterterrorism Center as threats from Al Qaeda shifted from Pakistan to Syria, Iraq and Yemen.
abstract: Matthew G Olsen, director of the National Counterterrorism Center, is resigning after three years.
lead_paragraph: Matthew G. Olsen has been director of the National Counterterrorism Center as threats from Al Qaeda shifted from Pakistan to Syria, Iraq and Yemen.

headline.main: U.S. Counterterrorism Chief to Step Down
